title: Translate Text
description: Translate text between languages, detect source languages, and perform batch translations with context-aware AI
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: translate
commands.description: Translate text from one language to another

parameters.name: source_language
parameters.description: Source language code (e.g. 'en', 'es', 'zh'). Auto-detected if omitted

returns.description: Translation result with translated text, detected source language, confidence score, and alternative translations for ambiguous phrases

commands.name: detect_language
commands.description: Detect the language of a given text

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to analyze for language detection

returns.description: Detection result with primary language code, language name, confidence score, and alternative language candidates

commands.name: batch_translate
commands.description: Translate multiple texts to the same target language in a single request

parameters.name: texts
parameters.description: Array of text strings to translate

parameters.name: target_language
parameters.description: Target language code for all texts

returns.description: Array of translation results, one per input text, each with translated text and detected source language
